description:
Samsung Galaxy M01s Price in Bangladesh October 2024

The Samsung Galaxy M01s is now available in a 3GB/32GB model. Now, the Samsung Galaxy M01s Price is BDT 11,999 in Bangladesh. Samsung Galaxy M01s has a 4000mAh battery. This device is running with Android 9 and powered by the Mediatek MT6762 Helio P22 (12 nm) chipset.

Samsung Galaxy M01s highlight

Samsung Galaxy M01s launched in 2020, July 16. The Samsung Galaxy M01s launched with model number SM-M017F, SM-M017F/DS. Firstly, Its dimensional measure is 156.9 x 75.8 x 7.8 mm (6.18 x 2.98 x 0.31 in) and the weight is 168 g (5.93 oz). Secondly, the display of the OnePlus 9E is a 6.2 inches PLS TFT capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors with 720×1560 pixels resolution. The display is protecting from the unknown. Thirdly and most importantly, It is powered by the Mediatek MT6762 Helio P22 (12 nm) chipset and running with Android 9. Moreover, it has up to Octa-core (4×2.0 GHz & 4×1.5 GHz) CPU.

Samsung Galaxy M01s phone has a Dual-camera setup on the back. This formation consists of 13 MP, f/1.8, 28mm (wide), 1/3.1″, 1.12µm & AF 2MP, f/2.4 (depth) It has an 8 MP, f/2.0 selfie camera inside the notch of the display. The video recording capability is 1080p@30fps. It has 3GB of RAM and 32GB of ROM. On the other hand, it can support up to microSDXC on uses a dedicated slot. Certainly, the Samsung Galaxy M01s has a non-removable 4000mAh battery. It has a dual nano-SIM card slot. That is to say, the Samsung Galaxy M01s is 2G/3G/4G supportable. The fingerprint sensor is under the display.

On the other hand, among the other features, there are WLAN, Bluetooth, FM Radio, USB port.

Your question and our opinion about Samsung Galaxy M01s

Which question you will have about this phone. Let’s justify these. There we are including the major question and answers about this phone. So, let’s start now.

When it released?

It launched on July 16, 2020.

What is the price of Samsung Galaxy M01s?

The price of Samsung Galaxy M01s is BDT. 11,999

How much RAM and ROM does it contain?

It has 3GB of RAM & 32GB of ROM.

Which type of display panel used in it?

It comes with a 6.2″ PLS TFT capacitive touchscreen, 16M colors with 720×1560 pixels resolution.

How is the processor and chipset?

It contains Mediatek MT6762 Helio P22 (12 nm) chipset and Android 9.

What is the camera and video capabilities?

The Dual camera setup on the back 13MP + 2MP and an 8MP selfie camera. The video recording capability is 4K@30/60fps,1080p@30fps.

Dose it is support 5G network?

No, It doesn’t support 5G network. It comes with 2G ,3G and 4G.

How the battery capacity is?

The battery capacity is a 4000mAh Li-Polymer battery without fast charging.

What sensors does this phone have?

Fingerprint (rear-mounted), accelerometer, proximity .

Which country and company manufactured it?

SAMSUNG manufactured it and this phone is made in Korea.

Reason to Buy

In this paragraph, we are going to describe the important major to buy this. Why a person may buy this smartphone? Firstly, when anyone wants to buy a device they find out the premium things on the device according to their price. So, let us find out some eligible things which are in Samsung Galaxy M01s.

Our Verdict

In conclusion, we are giving our verdict on this device. If you want to buy the best 4G smartphone under 15K Taka. Then Samsung Galaxy M01s will in the first row among the best smartphones. If you want a big back up on charge then you can buy this. Because it has a huge 4000mAh battery. In addition, it’s a4G supportable smartphone. So, you can get good network facilities on it. Therefore, to judge all of these reasons you can buy this.
